name: IV Castle Rumble: Imps Omen
description:
Castle Rumble: Imp's Omen is a group project I worked on as part of my 2nd-year module "Journeyman" at Teesside.
a wave-based survival where you play an helpless imp attempting to escape the castle.
I worked on this project as the UI/UX designer as well as co-lead of the design team.
